message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000.
I'm really interested in the product, but $15000 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $9000 for it.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $15000 might be a stretch, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $12500.
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to pay $10500 for the product.
I understand that you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to make another compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11750.
I'm getting closer to a deal, but I still need to be mindful of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $11000 for the product.
I'm willing to make one more compromise, Bob. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11250.
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I really need to be careful with my budget. I'd be willing to pay $10800 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11000.
